page.title: 19GILDERSOME SINCE 1957
page.content: Has grown in size & population.Woollen industry has disappeared.Industrial estates built.1968-new Gildersome Junior School opened(HT:G L Dawson), taking juniors from Street Lane J&I which closed & transferred infants to Gildersome CE.Community Hall & Library opened.Rev Denis Barraclough became new vicar.The Grove(home for senior citizens)opened.1975-Gelderd Rd JI School closed-pupils transferred to Birchfield JI School(HT:G C Gledhill). Health Centre & Clinic opened. 1981-Gildersome Junior School gutted by fire-electrical fault.New Junior School opened 1981.Three months later, CE Infant School gutted by fire-arson. After months of heated debate infant children transferred to Junior School, now Gildersome JI.1984-CE church dem- olished-no funds.1985 Induction of New CE Vicar-Rev David Martineau.
